name: NextGig Systems
tag_list: network-security, network-connectivity, it, data-aggregation, aggregation-taps, network-taps, aggregatoin-switches, firewall, ips, network-recorder, network-probe, network-monitor, gigamon, palo-alto-networks, network-instruments, net-optics, xena-network
overview: NextGig Systems provides network security, connectivity, enhanced network monitoring and test solutions for IT and development engineers. Focusing on network security and improving connectivity to network tools, NextGig can enhance visibility into today’s complex data centers and Enterprise networks. Solutions include: Network data aggregation which filters and replicates customized data streams to all network monitoring tools. Network Firewalls which take an application-centric approach to traffic classification to enable application visibility and policy control. SSL Inspector a transparent proxy for Secure Sockets Layer (SSL) network communications, providing existing sniffing, recording and filtering security appliances with access to the decrypted plain text of SSL-encrypted flows. Pre-deployment and development testing of Ethernet and Fibre Channel platforms. The NextGig team is trained and certified on the solutions they provide insuring a high level of expertise and support.
